data.name: 4th IEEE-International Conference on Control, Automation and Diagnosis
data.description:
The 2020 International Conference on Control, Automation and Diagnosis (ICCAD′20) is the 4th edition in the series of the International Conference on Control, Automation and Diagnosis, organized since 2017.
The First one (ICCAD′17) was held in Hammamet, Tunisia, in January 2017.

relatedRecords.name: Tech Rocks 2019
relatedRecords.description:
Tech Rocks est un espace pour les Tech leaders, pour les CTO de haut niveau qui souhaitent partager leurs expertises. Genèse du projet.
Tout vient d’un échange entre Francis Nappez, CTO de BlaBlaCar, Nicolas Silberman, ex CTO de Mediapart/20 Minutes et Cyril Pierre de Geyer, DG de l’Executive MBA E…
